articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Parks involved in the legal action have defended their sales practices and pitch fee rises.
articles.title: 'Ripped off' caravan owners start compensation fight

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The health secretary says this is "definitely a weekend to turn the heating on" after cuts to winter fuel payments for pensioners.
articles.title: UK weather: Temperatures fall to -7.9C with snow warnings for weekend

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Las Vegas police said the the person found in the vehicle with a gunshot wound to the head was Green Beret Matthew Livelsberger.
articles.title: Person in exploded Cybertruck outside Trump hotel in Las Vegas believed to be elite soldier

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Urfan Sharif, who was convicted of murdering his daughter Sara, is said to have been assaulted in HMP Belmarsh on New Year's Day.
articles.title: Police investigate after 'Sara Sharif killer attacked in prison'

articles.description: Sir Nick Clegg leave Meta ahead of Trump's return
articles.title: Sir Nick Clegg leave Meta ahead of Trump's return

articles.description: Friday's papers carry a variety of stories, including news the government is launching a commission to reform social care.
articles.title: Newspaper headlines: Sara Sharif's dad 'attacked' and social care 'shake-up'

articles.description: The government announces first steps to creating a National Care Services - but reform is several years away.
articles.title: National Care Service plans in pipeline for 2028, say ministers

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The number of people with flu in hospital has quadrupled in the last month, the latest data shows.
articles.title: Flu rises sharply in England's hospitals

articles.description: Police say that 18 people were injured in the deadly crash in the city of Fullerton, California.
articles.title: Two dead after plane crashes into California factory
